product.title: Luster Desert Sand - Roller Blind
product.description: Desert sand from their luster range introduces a delicate array of colours into the mix that you won't find anywhere else. From woody browns to crisp whites, and with plenty of sandy tones thrown in for good measure, it offers a welcome relief from the single colour fabrics you've been looking at until now. Introducing a calm and natural style of decor is something that more and more homes are doing in the last few years and when you see the results online it's easy to see why.

relproducts.title: Rimini Sand - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Rimini sand's pale yellow-cream hue is a pretty, uplifting addition to any window. Its light translucency means that plenty of light penetrates it, even when closed, so you'll never be lacking in sunshine. Pair sand with navy blues and light-coloured woods for a modern look with a unique twist, or with browns, greens, and golds for something classic and luxurious. Either of these would be the perfect look for the living room or dining room in a contemporary, stylish home.

relproducts.title: Stirlo Stone Beige
relproducts.description: Stirlo stone beige plain roller blind the stirlo range boast a fantastic range of dim-out privacy fabrics to compliment any room. The fabric is composed of 100% polyester and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with white chain used as standard, or a nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing.

relproducts.title: Calaf Beige Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: Here we have a pale beige vertical blind, its light enough in colour to be subtle at the window but still injects some colour into a design scheme. The pattern on the calaf fabric is inspired by the natural curved shape of a leaf and includes a soft sheen too. relproducts.description: We especially like this welwyn biscuit vertical blind, it gives us a warm fuzzy feeling inside. We think its the sunny neutral shade that does it. relproducts.description: This valenica simplicity vertical blind is light beige, just like an extremely milky coffee. Some might say buff or ecru but whatever you call it, it's a nice neutral colour that adds just enough tone to your window. relproducts.title: Choices Luster Glacier Grey Roller Blind
relproducts.description: With a touch of twinkle and an incredibly cool colour, this choices luster glacier grey roller blind is a modern blind for a perfect modern home. We all know that the love of grey is going nowhere, but with this textured surface and silvered undertones, this blind is at the peak with a touch of twinkle and an incredibly cool colour, this choices luster glacier grey roller blind is a modern blind for a perfect modern home.

relproducts.title: Luster Dusk - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Luster dusk brings a subtle blend of white and stone grey to the table, but there's also that little something extra that it's hard to put your finger on. As you stand back and ponder it you'll be surprised to learn that it's a gentle covering of sandy beige that gives dusk the finish from which it gets its name. When you want to feel inspired by your decor you need to get creative with the way you combine textures and colours.

relproducts.title: Luster Snow - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Luster snow puts you at ease and welcomes you through the door just like all great decor should. The delicate construction of the fabric belies its durability and functionality, whilst the off-white colour is the perfect blend of paper white and cream. The unique colour makes it a great candidate for the guest bedroom. This is a space where you want to add some understated style that will welcome your visitors, but not so much that it overwhelms them by imposing your own taste too heavily.

relproducts.title: Choices Luster Turquoise Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The choices luster turquoise roller blind is a wonderfully textured number, oozing comfort and charm, with a hint of sophistication thrown in for good measure. The blue green shade helps with this too. Its a sumptuous yet sleek shade, whilst the way it dresses the fabric cre the choices luster turquoise roller blind is a wonderfully textured number, oozing comfort and charm, with a hint of sophistication thrown in for good measure.

relproducts.title: Luster Perfect Fit
relproducts.description: This luster perfect fit blind, is a combination of their metal venetian blind and perfect fit frame to create an ideal blind for your upvc windows and doors. No screws, no drilling - innovative fixings.

relproducts.title: Luster Storm - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: As you take in the moody quality of luster storm you instantly get a feel for how it got its name. The stone grey has a timeless look that makes you feel like it has a thousand and one different stories to tell. Just what you need when you want to add some character to the modern home. Sandy beiges, creams, and pine are all great bedfellows for storm. They balance out the dark tones by introducing lighter surfaces that still have plenty of character and individuality.

relproducts.title: Luster Grey - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The beauty of luster grey is the way in which it breaks up the traditional single colour fabrics with dashes of white. It gives the whole blind a larger than life quality that lets the light flow around your room without saturating the existing colours. Introducing other finely detailed finishes would be an inspired choice if you want to continue the theme around the room. Look to the natural world for inspiration by focusing on the huge variety of wood grains that you can introduce with your furniture and flooring.

relproducts.title: Luster Glacier Grey Roman Blind
relproducts.description: With a light shimmer and strong texture, this luster glacier grey roman blind will twinkle its way into your home and into your heart. Glitter it may not be, but it has just as much pizzazz. The shade of grey is wonderfully warm too. We'd love to see this blind nestled against l with a light shimmer and strong texture, this luster glacier grey roman blind will twinkle its way into your home and into your heart.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Grey Roller Blind
relproducts.description: A highly popular range, loved by their customers for its simplicity and value for money, their stockholmfabrics come in a wide range of colours suitable for all rooms including kitchens and bathrooms. This grey roller blind blends perfectly with any style or taste, whether your decor is on the modern, minimalist side or if you prefer to add bright and bold accessories. This roller blind with accompanying white components and grey fabric colour is a easy and quick way to update your window.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Cream Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Stockholm cream is a beautiful neutral colour, and works perfectly with cool greys but also natural and wood tones. A real all rounder & great for injecting colour into any room. Their stockholm cream roller blind is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords maing them inherently child safe.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Frost Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Stockholmfrost is an attractive, clean and crisp white colour. It will freshen up any space within the home or office. Stockholm frost fabric is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords making them inherently child safe. As with all their made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee giving extra peace of mind when investing in this product.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Rock Grey Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Their moisture-resistant, stockholm rock roller blind is a stunning mid grey hue. It's a modern, on trend colour choice & will be a perfect finishing touch for your window. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including the option of a rust free chain so you can get just the perfect finishing touches for your window. This blind also comes with 5 year guarantee as standard, giving you peace of mind that you blind is built to last.

relproducts.title: Rimini (Blackout) Sand - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The rimini (blackout) in sand is a stylish, light, and vibrant blackout blind with a subtle, patterned texture. The sand colour makes this blind ideal for being added to bedrooms with a light blue colour scheme to give the whole room a natural, seaside feel throughout. Alternatively, add the sand to rooms with authentic wood features and bold tones for fantastic, striking colour contrasts.
